name: LD50 Project
description:
So third Ludum Dare right? Loved the theme this time around, and had to cut so many ideas for this little game that I might add more to it and polish it up a lil bit.
Also at the moment, the HTML version of the game doesn't want to work, I'm working on getting it up but in the meantime the windows download should work.

The game is simple, all you have to do is keep the arrow tiles from sliding all the way to the left. There are 3 options to do so:

Shield tiles block arrows until they break

T tiles push arrows back until they break

Crystal tiles remove adjacent arrows, until they break.

If only I had time to put a nicer tutorial in the game but thats how its been every time for me... But hey with the Extra tab maybe I can throw a status update on the jam too.

Thanks for giving this lil game a try.
